job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Tampa, FL

review_title: South Bay Hospital - Love this Hospital Family
job_title: Director in Sun City Center, FL
pros:
-Unique community experience with senior population and growth of younger families in surrounding zips
- Work culture is very team and family oriented. Everyone helps onboard you. 
-Community hospital feel with large system support
-Leadership is very involved in supporting teams and is proactive
-New patient tower and service additions support growth needs in growing part of Hillsborough County
-Excellent benefits and stock earning potential. 
-Mentoring environment with open door policies. 
-Very good bent toward work/life balance needs. Flexible.
cons: -Smaller facility that can sometimes lose team members to growth potential within system, but it's really not a con when you can learn and grow if that is the career path you need. Also long time employees who are loyal offset this turnover.

pros: Was a great place to work...Small hospital made it family oriented...Co workers played team work...loved working for southbay until the wrong ppl were hired and administration made it a not so entising place to work...
cons: Staff is over worked...not safe for patients nor employees...employees forced to take more call than usual because of not enough staff!

review_title: HARD WORK, GOOD REWARDS, JOB SECURITY
job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Sun City, FL
pros: Balance of personal life and work is fair and I like the people I work with. The majority of our patients are elderly and the job is challenging, but rewarding.
cons: Heavy assignments wtih high patient acuity. Inability to take adequate lunch breaks. Many times there are missing medications, which causes delay in medication delivery to the patients.

job_title: ER RN in Sun City Center, FL
pros: Tight group. Few number of providers makes it easy to get to know them. Polite, never felt disrespected.
cons: Work load at times was overwhelming. At times 8 patients to 1 nurse. However, work flow changes are improving these numbers.
